name: fso22
description: Backend application implementation for the part3 of the full stack open course.

scripts.build:ui: rm -r -fo build && cd ../fullstack-open-22/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fso22/build/ && cd ../../../fso22/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Milan M.
